Name: Scottish Gypsy
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Scotch and Bénédictine complement each other in this herbal cocktail which is balanced by the addition of bitters.
Nutrition: One serving of Scottish Gypsy contains 154 calories
